Event.name: Gathering_up
Event.definition: <def-root>This frame describes an <fen>Agent</fen>'s gathering of <fen>Individuals</fen> (people or entities) into a group, the <fen>Aggregate</fen>, defined by relative proximity. <ex><fex name="Agent">The police</fex> <t>gathered</t> <fex name="Individuals">the suspects</fex> <fex name="Aggregate">into a line-up</fex>.</ex> Compare this frame with Congregating, and contrast it with Amalgamating.</def-root>

Arg.name: Aggregate
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the aggregate that results from the gathering. It may be expressed either as an adjunct result phrase or as a direct object of a target verb. <ex>The police <t>gathered</t> the suspects <fex name="Aggregate">into a line-up</fex>.</ex> <ex>He <t>amassed</t> <fex name="Aggregate">a collection of shiny bits of tin foil</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>Agent is the person who gathers Individuals. <ex><fex name="Agent">The police</fex> <t>gathered</t> the suspects into a lineup.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the gathering event occurs, if specified. The crowd assembled <fex name="Time">at dawn</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An act performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the gathering. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the gathering event occurs. He <t>assembled</t> the children <fex name="Place">in the hall</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Individuals
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the entities that come together to form an Aggregate. <ex>The police <t>gathered</t> <fex name="Individuals">the suspects</fex> into a line-up.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Individuals</fen> are gathered up.
<ex>Sue <t>assembled</t> the team <fex name="Manner">quickly</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Instrument</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> uses to gather the <fen>Individuals</fen> together.
<ex>Native Americans <t>gathered</t> these bulbs <fex name="Instrument">with specially whittled and fired digging sticks</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to bring about by gathering.</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times the Gathering_up event occurs per some unit of time. </def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the Gathering_up event occurs and of which it is taken to be a part. </def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Goal</fen> designates the location where the <fen>Individuals</fen> might end up.</def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Co-participant</fen> participates in a coordinated way in the same event as the primary protagonist.</def-root>

Arg.name: Path
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Path</fen> is the trajectory of motion that the <fen>Individuals</fen> take.</def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location where the <fen>Individuals</fen> are at the beginning of the gathering event.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: gather.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: bring together or collect people or items (esp. crops).

lexUnit.name: convene.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: call people together for a purpose.

lexUnit.name: herd.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to bring together a large group or class of people

lexUnit.name: amass.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to collect something over time
